path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Coinfabrik/Security Audit - Send (SDT) Token Sale ICO Smart Contract - CoinFabrik Blog.pdf

findings.title: Unveriﬁed BTC purchases allowed through SaleProxy
findings.description: The _TokenSale_ contract only allows contributions that go through a _SaleProxy_ contract but doesn't provide any sort of check that a pertinent BTC transfer has been included in the bitcoin blockchain.

findings.title: Not extensive SafeMath usage
findings.description: Some contracts like _TokenSale.sol_ are missing _SafeMath_ functions for sensible calculations.

findings.title: Contract soft locking attacks (DoS)
findings.description: Potential gas cost of functions being over the gas limit, missing function qualifiers or misuse of them, fallback functions with higher gas cost than a transfer or send call allows, underhanded or erroneous code, and code and contract interaction complexity.

findings.title: Potential gas cost of functions being over the gas limit
findings.description: Functions may have a gas cost exceeding the gas limit, potentially leading to unexpected behavior or contract failure.

findings.title: Missing function qualifiers or misuse of them
findings.description: Potential issue with missing or misused function qualifiers.

findings.title: Fallback functions with higher gas cost than a what a transfer or send call allows
findings.description: The fallback function has a higher gas cost than what a transfer or send call allows, potentially leading to issues.

findings.title: Wrong or missing error handling
findings.description: The audit report highlights the potential issue of wrong or missing error handling, which can lead to unforeseen consequences.

findings.title: Insufficient coverage of function input requirements
findings.description: The contract does not properly validate or handle function inputs, which can lead to unexpected behavior or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Standard non-compliance (EIP20, etc)
findings.description: Non-compliance with standard token interfaces such as EIP20

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting an unlimited number of Sundae tokens.
